description:
With Aruba Cloud Computing you create and manage your virtual datacenter

With Aruba Cloud Computing for webOS you can manage the Aruba Cloud service even through your smartphone and tablet.

The application allows you to view the features of the virtual Data Centers, perform operations on the Cloud Servers and top-up your credit directly from your smartphone, paying by PayPal or Credit Card.

Features:
- Access with Account and Password
- Display list of active Cloud Servers and details of their configuration
- Display details of the costs and estimates for each Cloud Server
- Display your credit
- Possibility to top-up the credit of the account
- Possibility to switch the Cloud Server on or off 
- Possibility to export disks.

Aruba Cloud Computing is the Aruba Cloud service that allows you to design and manage your virtual Data Center easily and quickly, paying just for the resources that you use on a cost-per-hour basis.
Find out more at: http://www.cloud.it e http://computing.cloud.it
